actions.name: CreateSoftwareConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to create a software configuration

actions.name: CreateSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to create a subscription for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

actions.name: DeleteSoftwareConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the software configuration

actions.name: DescribeHardwarePlatform
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the hardware platform

actions.name: DescribeSoftwareConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the software configuration

actions.name: DescribeSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to describes the subscription for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

actions.name: GetEmpPatchUrl
actions.description: Grants permission to get URL for sotware patch-release, patch-diff and release notes under FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

actions.name: GetSoftwareURL
actions.description: Grants permission to get the URL for Amazon FreeRTOS software download

actions.name: GetSoftwareURLForConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get the URL for Amazon FreeRTOS software download based on the configuration

actions.name: GetSubscriptionBillingAmount
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch the subscription billing amount for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

actions.name: ListFreeRTOSVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to lists versions of AmazonFreeRTOS

actions.name: ListHardwarePlatforms
actions.description: Grants permission to list the hardware platforms

actions.name: ListHardwareVendors
actions.description: Grants permission to list the hardware vendors

actions.name: ListSoftwareConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to lists the software configurations

actions.name: ListSoftwarePatches
actions.description: Grants permission to list software patches of subscription for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

actions.name: ListSubscriptionEmails
actions.description: Grants permission to list the subscription emails for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

actions.name: ListSubscriptions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the subscriptions for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

actions.name: UpdateEmailRecipients
actions.description: Grants permission to update list of subscription email address for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)

actions.name: UpdateSoftwareConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the software configuration

actions.name: VerifyEmail
actions.description: Grants permission to verify the email for FreeRTOS extended maintenance plan (EMP)
